name: Upgrades starting at 14,95€
description: Upgrade option for previous customers! Please choose one of the different options depending on the bundle you already have. Options - From All Drums V1 to V2 --> 14,95€ - From All Drums V2 to TMF Producer Bundle --> 29,95€ - From TMF Cabinets to All Drums --> 29,95€ - From All Drums V1 to TMF Producer Bundle --> 34,95€ - From TMF Cabients to Producer Bundle --> 49,95€ This upgrade is only valid for customers that own any of the bundles listed before, further confirmation before sending the files in our data base needed.

name: TMF Producer Bundle [All Drum Samples + All Cab Impulses + Sabian Cymbal Pack]
description: All the samples available in one pack. Promo Video Mix Through 12 Full Kits including: - Insubordinate Kit - Fearless Kit - Pearl MasterWorks Full Kit - Pearl Presstige Mahogany Full Kit - Tama SuperStar Kit - Tama Birch - Pearl Chad Smith Signature Full Kit - Yamaha Maple Custom Full Kit - Tama RockStar Full Kit - Yamaha OAK Custom Full Kit - Sonor Force Full Kit - Gretsch Full Kit 4 Signature Snare Drums including: - Ludwig Black Beauty - Pearl Joey Jordison Signature - Black Panther Cherry Bomb - Pearl Vinnie Paul Signature 3 Extra Kick Drums including: - Kick DW Midnight - Kick DW Bamboo Series - Kick Roger Samples are ready to use, mixed and processed recorded with quality Mikes, Preamps and Converters. Samples in WAV 44,1KHz&24bits, Gog (Drumagog), TCI´s Slate Trigger format and Kontakt (5.10.6066 or later required) *No gog & nki´s for Yamaha Oak/Vinnie Paul Signature and Tama Rockstar THIS IS A SET OF AUDIO FILES ONLY, THIS IS NOT A PHYSICAL DRUM. The Package is in .RAR format, so you will need WINRAR to extract its contents. Mix Through Bogner V30 audio test Bogner GT75 audio test Orange audio test Mesa audio test Only Guitar Cabinets - Bogner Ubercab 412 V30>75 - Mesa Rectifier Std 412 V30 - Orange PPC412 V30 - Marshall JCM900 GT75 - Marshall 1960DM V30 - Framus Dragon 412 V30 - Engl E412 Standar V60 The Chain - RME interface - SSL converter - API 3124 Amp Settings -Peavey 6505+ power amp with Presence set at 5 -Peavey 6505+ power amp with Presence set at 8 -Peavey 6505+ power amp with Presence set at 10 -Mesa Single Rectifier power amp Mic Possitions -Shure SM 57 on axis -Shure SM 57 off axis at 45º (fredman) -Sennheiser MD421 II aiming the dustcap -AKG 414 aiming between the center of the cone and the edge of the speaker. - Royer 121 clone aiming the dustcap Tech info Sabian Cymbal Info - SABIAN HH POWER BELL RIDE 22 in - SABIAN AAX STAGE HAT 14 in - SABIAN HH MINI CHINESE 14in - MEIN CLASSIC BELL 8in - SABIAN AAX STUDIO CRASH 16in - PAISTE ALPHA SPLASH 8in - SABIAN HHX SPLASH 10in - SABIAN AAX STUDIO CRASH 18in - ZILDJIAN AVEDIS CRASH 15in - SABIAN HH RIDE ROCK 22in - SABIAN AAX CHINA 18in - PAISTE ALPHA HH 14in Meinl Cymbal Info - MB20 High Hat 14in - MB10 Crash 19in - MB10 Splash 10in - MB10 Crash 17in - MB20 Crash 20in - Meinl Bell - MB10 Ride 20in - Meinl Classic China 16in - MB10 China 16in - Bizanze Splash 8in Cymbals are panned from drummer perspective and come in Wav and Nki´s (Kontakt 4.22) format.

name: All Drums Samples V2 [Include 16 Snares, 15 Kicks & 12 set of toms]
description: All drum samples available in one pack. Promo Video Mix Through 11 Full Kits including: - Insubordinate Kit - Fearless Kit - Pearl MasterWorks Full Kit - Pearl Presstige Mahogany Full Kit - Tama SuperStar Kit - Tama Birch - Pearl Chad Smith Signature Full Kit - Yamaha Maple Custom Full Kit - Tama RockStar Full Kit - Yamaha OAK Custom Full Kit - Sonor Force Full Kit - Gretsch Full Kit 4 Signature Snare Drums including: - Ludwig Black Beauty - Pearl Joey Jordison Signature - Black Panther Cherry Bomb - Pearl Vinnie Paul Signature 3 Extra Kick Drums including: - Kick DW Midnight - Kick DW Bamboo Series - Kick Roger Samples are ready to use, mixed and processed recorded with quality Mikes, Preamps and Converters. Samples in WAV 44,1KHz&24bits, Gog (Drumagog), TCI´s Slate Trigger format and Kontakt (5.10.6066 or later required) *No gog & nki´s for Yamaha Oak/Vinnie Paul Signature and Tama Rockstar THIS IS A SET OF AUDIO FILES ONLY, THIS IS NOT A PHYSICAL DRUM. The Package is in .RAR format, so you will need WINRAR to extract its contents.

name: Insubordinate Kit [Kick, Snare, Rack & Floor Toms]

Recorded with SSL6000 and Neve 1073 preamps, using Hardware EQ&Comp´s Samples in WAV 44,1KHz&24bits/ TCI´s Trigger ) THIS IS A SET OF AUDIO FILES ONLY, THIS IS NOT A PHYSICAL SNARE DRUM. The Package is in .RAR format, so you will need WINRAR to extract its contents.

name: Fearless Kit [Kick, Snare, Rack & Floor Tom]

name: Meinl Cymbal Bundle
description: Cymbal preview You will find chokes and crescendo effects as long as other articulations. Cymbal Info - MB20 High Hat Sound Wave 14in - MB10 Medium Crash 19in - Classic Splash 10in - MB20 Heavy Crash 17in - MB20 Medium Heavy Crash 20in - Meinl Classic Bell 8in - MB10 Medium Ride 20in - Meinl Classic China 18in - MB10 China 17in - Byzance Splash 12in Cymbals are panned from drummer perspective and come in Wav and Nki´s (Kontakt 4.22) format.

name: Sabian Cymbal Bundle
description: Tech info Cymbal Info - SABIAN HH POWER BELL RIDE 22 in - SABIAN AAX STAGE HAT 14 in - SABIAN HH MINI CHINESE 14in - MEIN CLASSIC BELL 8in - SABIAN AAX STUDIO CRASH 16in - PAISTE ALPHA SPLASH 8in - SABIAN HHX SPLASH 10in - SABIAN AAX STUDIO CRASH 18in - ZILDJIAN AVEDIS CRASH 15in - SABIAN HH RIDE ROCK 22in - SABIAN AAX CHINA 18in - PAISTE ALPHA HH 14in You will find chokes and crescendo effects as long as other articulations. Cymbals are panned from drummer perspective and come in Wav and Nki´s (Kontakt 4.22) format.

name: TMF Cabinets Bundle [7 top Cabinets, 136 different impulses Axe I&II ready]
description: Video Mix Through Bogner V30 audio test Bogner GT75 audio test Orange audio test Mesa audio test Framus audio test Engl audio test Only Guitar Impulses are ready for regular impulse loader and also Axe I & II Cabinetsa - Bogner Ubercab 412 V30>75 - Mesa Rectifier Std 412 V30 - Mesa Adam D Inspired Technique (6"away) - Orange PPC412 V30 - Marshall JCM900 GT75 - Marshall 1960DM V30 - Engl E412 V60 - Framus Dragon V30 The Chain - RME interface - SSL converter - API 3124 - Neve 1073 Amp Settings -Peavey 6505+ power amp with Presence set at 5 -Peavey 6505+ power amp with Presence set at 8 -Peavey 6505+ power amp with Presence set at 10 -Mesa Single Rectifier power amp Mic Possitions -Shure SM 57 on axis -Shure SM 57 off axis at 45º (fredman) -Sennheiser MD421 II aiming the dustcap -AKG 414 aiming between the center of the cone and the edge of the speaker. - Roger R121 clone dustcap

name: Adam D inspired MESA 412 Impulses
description: Mix Context Only Guitars The Chain - RME interface - SSL converter - API 3124 Amp Settings -Peavey 6505+ power amp with Resonance|Presence set at 10 Mic Possitions -Shure SM 57 on axis 6" inches back -Shure SM 57 off axis at 45º (fredman) 6" inches back Because of the distance of the mic from the Cab there is no proximity effect, so you will have to Eq a bit around 90 hz and some high shelving!

name: Bogner Ubercab 412 bundle[V30|GT75 in X pattern]
description: Audio clip Only Guitar The Chain - RME interface - SSL converter - API 3124 Amp Settings -Peavey 6505+ power amp with Presence set at 5 -Peavey 6505+ power amp with Presence set at 8 -Peavey 6505+ power amp with Presence set at 10 -Mesa Single Rectifier power amp Mic Possitions -Shure SM 57 on axis -Shure SM 57 off axis at 45º (fredman) -Sennheiser MD421 II aiming the dustcap -AKG 414 aiming between the center of the cone and the edge of the speaker. You get 32 different impulses!
